Title: The Return of Avery Jessup
Plot: Avery finally returns home from her kidnapping ordeal in North Korea, yet Jack grows uncertain of her fidelity while she was away. Elsewhere, Criss is crossed due to Liz's role as top wage earner, and Jenna seeks a sponsor for her approaching nuptials.
GuestStars: James Marsden, Margaret Cho, Michael Mosley, Elizabeth Banks
